revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Distortion World |image = [[File:Distortion World.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Distortion World. |tokens = 86,500 |location = East of Route 214. }} '''Distortion World''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 1,350,400 HP. [[Sendoff Spring]] must be cleared to unlock this Dungeon again.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || colspan=3 rowspan=8 | <center> N/A |- | [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly |- | [[File:Duskull.png|40px]] Duskull |- | [[File:Dusclops.png|40px]] Dusclops |- | [[File:Chimecho.png|40px]] Chimecho |- | [[File:Chingling.png|40px]] Chingling |- | [[File:Bronzor.png|40px]] Bronzor |- | [[File:Bronzong.png|40px]] Bronzong |}
===Boss Encounters=== <!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Giratina_(altered).png|40px]] '''Giratina (altered)*''' || <center>11,880,000 || [[File:Galactic_Boss_(cyrus).png|40px]] Galactic Boss Cyrus || [[File:Houndoom.png|40px]] Houndoom, [[File:Honchkrow.png|40px]] Honchkrow, [[File:Crobat.png|40px]] Crobat, [[File:Gyarados.png|40px]] Gyarados, [[File:Weavile.png|40px]] Weavile || <center>1,128,000 |} '''*Note: Must be Sinnoh Champion to unlock Girantina (altered)'''

<!--T:8--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! <tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:9-->
<!--T:10--> After Reaching Alola, the drop chance for items in Sinnoh will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:11--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
